name: Deeper Devils
description:
A falling fps game made for LD48, and my first Ludum Dare Entry. 

Jump on guys or touch the ground to reload. Shoot your gun to slow your descent.

Web build seems to run fine but if you run into performance issues I recommend trying the desktop version. 

Controls: 

WASD to Move 

Mouse to aim and shoot

 Space to Jump

The game is pretty short and keeps track of your time and other stats, try to beat my time of 62 seconds :)
